titles.title: Gotta Keep Pressing In, My Brother

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Gotta keep pressing in, my brother, gotta keep pressing in
For the way is narrow, yes, the way is hard
But we've gotta enter in
Hold fast to the vision, lay aside all doubt
Lay aside all flesh, lay aside division
For we've gotta keep pressing in, my brother
Gotta keep pressing in.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Gotta keep pressing in, my sister, gotta keep pressing in
For the way is narrow, yes, the way is hard
But we've gotta enter in
Hold fast to the vision, lay aside all doubt
Lay aside all flesh, lay aside division
For we've gotta keep pressing in, my sister
Gotta keep pressing in.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Gotta keep pressing in, my family, gotta keep pressing in
For the way is narrow, yes, the way is hard
But we've gotta enter in
Hold fast to the vision, lay aside all doubt
Lay aside all flesh, lay aside division
For we've gotta keep pressing in, my family.
